thread.title: Hollywood celebrities help fund Silicon Valley’s next stars
thread.title_full: Hollywood celebrities help fund Silicon Valley’s next stars - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Washington Post
title: Hollywood celebrities help fund Silicon Valley’s next stars
text: Actor Ashton Kutcher was one of the first celebrities to embrace social media as a way to build his fan base. But outside the spotlight, he’s also been a prolific investor in tech startups like Uber. Kutcher is among a growing number of Hollywood actors and musicians who have turned their attention up north in recent years, pouring their wealth into some of Silicon Valley’s hottest startups.
